body:
Hello

We would like to get your guys' opinion into our events more. So therefore, we will be doing a vote for what you guys want to see. We will be more organised this time, and the official post will come out in 24 hours (8:30PM BST). 

Please vote here:

http://www.strawpoll.me/5587555 if the link above on 'here' didn't work.

We hope to improve on today's event.

Thank you

The unofficial event coordinators

title: Unofficial Event 3 - Vote for the event!

replies.body: Seeing as the Official tournament is coming soon, we are going to wait a while until we do another unofficial one.
